title: Cover crop roller 6m
summary: Front tractor-mounted roller system to terminate and/or bruise cover crops ahead of direct drill.

eligible.eligibleBullet01: a cover crop roller to terminate or bruise cover crops before direct drilling.
eligible.eligibleBullet03: have an uneven or ridged surface to help crimp or bruise the cover crop.
eligible.eligibleBullet04: crimp or bruise the crop across the full working width of the roller.
eligible.eligibleText01: Flat rolls and ring rolls are not eligible under this item.
